==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* In {{W|Hawaiian Mythology}}, {{W|Kanaloa}} is the god of the Underworld and the sea. He is also a teacher of magic.
** {{W|Kāne}} and Kanaloa are often portrayed as complementary powers.
